snippet.title: Adidas Championship Tie Break - Atari ST (1990)
snippet.description:
"Adidas Championship Tie Break" is a tennis game developed and published by Ocean Software in 1990 on the Atari ST.

00:00 Title screen
01:13 French Open
04:58 British Open
08:37 Masters New York
11:41 Australian Open

This game uses a top-down scrolling perspective. You are not in control of the player's motion, but once he gets close to the ball, shot selection is down to you. 
The game supports up to 16 players in singles matches on a variety of court surfaces. It includes all of the major world tournaments - the four Grand Slam events at Melbourne, Roland Garros, Wimbledon and New York, plus the Davis Cup and Masters events.

http://www.atarimania.com/game-atari-st-adidas-championship-tie-break_10618.html
https://www.atarilegend.com/games/529
